about_the_game:
Welcome to It's A Farmer Thing

Your ticket to a stress-free farming adventure!

In this relaxed farming simulator, you purchase a beautiful island that you can slowly make your own at your own pace. While you do need to pay off the debts associated with the purchase, there's no rush – the island remains your home, whether you're working hard or taking a break.

There are countless ways to build your farming empire: raise animals, tend to your crops, mine for valuable resources, or enjoy the peaceful life by picking apples. Each activity brings you closer to your goal.

Base Building

Yes, that too! Shape the world exactly how you like it.

The best part? Everything is 100% optional. Everything you need is already available in the world.

But if you don’t like your house, you can simply tear it down and rebuild it to your taste.

With a wide variety of building parts and decorative items, you can create your dream home. And if one house isn’t enough, there’s plenty of room for a second or even third ... Maybe you want a house for every day of the week, and two on Sundays? No problem!

You won’t have to chop down half the forest just to build a wall. Nope! All building parts come at a small cost, easily earned by picking a few apples.

Single and Multiplayer

Play solo or with your friends in online multiplayer – the choice is yours. Together, you can explore the island, earn money, or simply relax and take in the views.

Multiple Characters

Choose from four (for now) charming playable characters, and make use of a variety of helpful vehicles to get your tasks done and customize your farm to your liking.

It's A Farmer Thing offers a relaxed, humorous atmosphere, with funny character interactions and charming details that brighten up the experience. Whether you're working hard or simply unwinding, you set the pace. No losses, no stress – just progress and fun!

Additionally, It's A Farmer Thing doesn’t follow a strict graphical style, but combines a charming low-poly aesthetic with modern techniques. By utilizing advanced features like Global Illumination, it creates a unique blend of simple, playful graphics and modern visual effects, making the experience both vibrant and atmospheric.

The game is playable in all languages, as players can translate the language files themselves. Plus, controller support is in the works, making the gameplay experience even more versatile!

"You’ll be surprised by the secrets your island holds – who knows what else might fly across the sky."

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690K | AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1060 6GB | AMD RX580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Min resolution 800x600

  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 | AMD Ryzen 7 3700 or better

  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 | AMD Radeon RX 6600 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
